member.name: SP_DRVINFO_DATA
member.summary: An SP_DRVINFO_DATA structure contains information about a driver. This structure is a member of a driver information list that can be associated with a particular device instance or globally with a device information set.

member.name: SP_DRVINFO_DATA.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the SP_DRVINFO_DATA structure. For more information, see the Remarks section in this topic.

summary.para: The type of driver represented by this structure. Must be one of the following values:
This structure represents a class driver.
This structure represents a compatible driver.

member.name: SP_DRVINFO_DATA.Reserved
member.summary: Reserved. For internal use only.

member.name: SP_DRVINFO_DATA.Description
member.summary: A NULL-terminated string that describes the device supported by this driver.

member.name: SP_DRVINFO_DATA.MfgName
member.summary: A NULL-terminated string that contains the name of the manufacturer of the device supported by this driver.

summary.para: A NULL-terminated string giving the provider of this driver. This is typically the name of the organization that creates the driver or INF file. ProviderName can be an empty string.
Date of the driver. From the DriverVer entry in the INF file. See the INF DDInstall Section for more information about the DriverVer entry.
Version of the driver. From the DriverVer entry in the INF file.
